metadata.inclusion: Pull the battery tab on the backside of the sensor, or remove then re-install the batteries. The LED will blink.
metadata.exclusion:
1. Remove the sensor cover
2. Press the Connect Button next to the battery quickly 3 times in a row. The LED will flash five times indicating exclusion.
metadata.reset:
1. Remove the sensor cover and confirm the sensor is powered
2. Press and hold the button for at least 10 seconds, then release. A flashing light indicates successful factory reset
